overview: Damn…it was that time again. Paul told us – here's a bunch of money. I want you to take the RV and head out to Vegas and buy me some prime hooker pussy for my line. Now who can say no to that? So since Johnny was out of jail for his last offense, and Marc needed a going away present, we called Otto and hit the road. Fear and Whoring…here we come!
title: The Bang Van 5
